comment:
* Class holding initialization code for role in the permission module.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public static void registerServiceWrappers()
methods.comment:
* Called by {@link SystemServiceRegistry}'s static initializer and registers * {@link RoleManager} to {@link Context}, so that {@link Context#getSystemService} can return * it. * *

If this is called from other places, it throws a {@link IllegalStateException).
